transfer.description: Transfers tokens to a specified address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of the token holder.

approve.description: Approves a spender to withdraw a specified amount of tokens from the caller's account.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining number of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the token holder.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the allowance granted to a spender by the caller.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the allowance granted to a spender by the caller.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with the given admin address.

burn.description: Burns a specified amount of tokens from the caller's account.

burnFrom.description: Burns a specified amount of tokens from a specified account.

mint.description: Mints a specified amount of tokens to a specified address.

transferOwnership.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new address.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places the token uses.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of the token.

balanceOf.description: Returns the token balance of a specified address.

DOMAIN_SEPARATOR.description: Returns the domain separator for EIP712.

nonces.description: Returns the nonce for a specified address.

permit.description: Allows a spender to spend tokens on behalf of the owner via EIP712.

pendingOwner.description: Returns the address of the pending owner.
